transArray.content:
1. The room facilities are very smart, the bathroom is very clean, the facilities are complete, the TV is huge, and it is super fun to watch dramas.
    2. The front desk service is very good and very enthusiastic. They will help with luggage and provide water when checking in. The robot that delivers food is very cute. My children especially like it.
    3. The breakfast is also very rich, with many varieties. The noodles recommended by the waiter are delicious and freshly cooked. There are also freshly baked egg tarts, which are delicious. Great hotel!
    4. Overall itâ€™s good, very cost-effective, recommended to stay!

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you very much for your evaluation of us. Your satisfaction is the biggest motivation for hotel staff to move forward. With your encouragement, we will work harder to do better and provide more guests with a warm and comfortable stay environment. We are very much looking forward to your next stay. Next visit!
